gov.cms.qrda.validator.web.service

Interface ValidationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValidationServiceImpl

    public interface ValidationService
    The ValidationService creates and run validation suites. A validation suite consists of a schematron file, and a list of test case files to validate against the schematron. All results are stored in the validation suite object.
    Author:
    Dan Donahue, ESAC Inc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValidationSuite getValidationFromHistory(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String filename)
      Retrieves a validation suite from the application history.
      ValidationSuite resetValidationSuite(ValidationSuite vs)
      Resets the given ValidationSuite object to a "tests not run" state.
      void runValidation(ValidationSuite vs)
      Applies the schematron of the validation suite to each of the test cases in the suite.
      ValidationSuite setupValidationSuite(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String schematronType, java.lang.String schematronFile, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> testCases)
      Creates a ValidationSuite from the arguments provided.

    • Method Detail

      • setupValidationSuite

        ValidationSuite setupValidationSuite(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String schematronType,
                                     java.lang.String schematronFile,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> testCases)
        Creates a ValidationSuite from the arguments provided. The schematronType argument, for example "HL7", "CEC", "HQR" or "PQRS", represents a subdirectory under the QRDA_HOME/qrda/schematrons folder on the server.
        Parameters:
        name, - the name of the suite to use
        schematronType, - the type (category) of scheamtron
        schematronFile, - the name of the schematron file to use
        testCases, - the list of test filenames to use
        Returns:
        a ValidationSuite object.

      • resetValidationSuite

        ValidationSuite resetValidationSuite(ValidationSuite vs)
        Resets the given ValidationSuite object to a "tests not run" state.
        Parameters:
        vs, - the Validation suite to reset
        Returns:
        the ValidationSuite object

      • runValidation

        void runValidation(ValidationSuite vs)
        Applies the schematron of the validation suite to each of the test cases in the suite. The schematron is first transformed into an .xsl file prior to applying it to the test cases. Interim result status text is added to the validation suite and each test case as the validation process proceeds.
        Parameters:
        vs, - the ValidationSuite object to run.

      • getValidationFromHistory

        ValidationSuite getValidationFromHistory(java.lang.String type,
                                         java.lang.String filename)
        Retrieves a validation suite from the application history.
        Parameters:
        type, - the type (category) of the schematron used in the ValidationSuite object.
        filename, - the name of the ValidationSuite to retrieve
        Returns:
        a ValidationSuite object
